name: market for limestone, unprocessed | limestone, unprocessed | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/15645/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'limestone, unprocessed', in the Global geography.;No transport, since next step takes place in same location

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'limestone, unprocessed',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  limestone, unprocessed', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: B:Mining and quarrying/08:Other mining and quarrying/081:Quarrying of stone, sand and clay/0810:Quarrying of stone, sand and clay
